summary: Over a period of a week the voice of God is heard on radios all over the world.
cast: James Whitmore|Nancy Reagan|Gary Gray|Lillian Bronson|Art Smith|Tom D'Andrea|Jeff Corey|Bob Alden|Michael Barrett|Mary Bear|Billy Bletcher|Donna Boswell|Cecil Brown|Frank Cady|Douglas Carter|George Chandler|Lyle Clark|James Conaty|Milton R. title: The Next Voice You Hear...
